Title: The Fastest Way to His Heart
Description:
Oh, girl! You're never going to guess who's out on the oil platform to the north.

<Izzy shakes her head sadly at you.>

Chip's out there, and he's working for the Trade Prince. That cold-hearted snake dropped you like a bad habit and now he's working for the other team. I even heard he's going out with that tramp, Candy Cane!

I don't know about you, but if he was my ex, I'd rip his still-beating heart out of his chest.
ObjectivesText: Rip the Still-Beating Heart from out of Chip Endale's chest.
PortraitGiverText: Carve the Still-Beating Heart from his chest!
CompletionText: What did you decide? Death or forgiveness?
RewardText:
He got just what he deserved. There, there, don't cry. You'll find someone else that'll treat you right.

Here, let me take that... we wouldn't want people to think that you're crazy.
